meanings.definition: A person who assigns tasks or duties to others.
meanings.sent1: The taskmasters at the office ensure everyone has work to do.
meanings.sent2: The taskmasters in the factory are responsible for delegating assignments.
meanings.sent3: The taskmasters decided to play a game where they assigned silly tasks to each other.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ants, the queen is the ultimate taskmaster, assigning roles to every worker.
meanings.sent5: The taskmasters in the army were known for their strict but fair leadership.

meanings.definition: A group of people who oversee and manage the work of others.
meanings.sent1: The team of taskmasters monitored the progress of the project closely.
meanings.sent2: The taskmasters gathered to discuss the upcoming tasks for the week.
meanings.sent3: During the team-building exercise, the taskmasters had to coordinate a blindfolded obstacle course.
meanings.sent4: The taskmasters of the event ensured that everything ran smoothly behind the scenes.
meanings.sent5: The taskmasters of the construction site were always on top of every detail.
